# PED::GET_PED_COMBAT_MOVEMENT

## Summary
Get the current type of combat movement

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped

## Returns
* **COMBAT_MOVEMENT**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
See SET_PED_COMBAT_MOVEMENT
